key.name: context-menu-icons
key.description: If enabled, icons can be displayed in context menu. If disabled, context menu will not have any icons.

key.name: property-dlg-hidefile-checkbox
key.summary: Display a checkbox to hide or unhide a file in property dialog
key.description: If enabled, there will be a checkbox to toggle hide state of a file in property dialog. There will be a '.hidden' file generated in the folder which contains the file, which recorded all the file names that should hide from the file view.

key.name: protect-non-media-mounts
key.summary: Do not allowed eject or unmount if mount point is not under /media
key.description: If enabled, mounts which not mounted under /media will not allowed to eject or unmount. If disabled, context menu will not have any icons.

key.name: auto-merge
key.summary: Wether use auto merge on the desktop
key.description: If enabled, auto merge menu will display on the desktop. If disabled, auto merge menu will not display on the desktop.
